name: JeffTheGame
description:
This is a small Unity game project that was made for Dinoflask's giveaway.
I have decided not to work on this anymore, as I have other, more important things to do.
Some textures don't look how they are supposed to look but they are fine in the desktop version. You can download that version here.

As most of you probably know, i won the second prize of the giveaway! YAAAY!

Conrtols:

Move: WASD
Shoot: Spacebar
Restart: R
